sample-isolation-and-treatment_sample_is: Water collected from 10m depth via Niskin filtered through 0.2 micron pore size polyethersulfone (SUPOR 200) filter and frozen in sucrose lysis buffer. Extraction proceeded using SDS (1% final) and Proteinase K followed by Silica Column Purification (Qiagen DNEasy) and direct sequencing of product.
technical-contact_organization_address: Marine Science Institute ; 93106 ; University of California Santa Barbara ; CA
